CallMethodMod.Sql: select '|CREATEBY|' as createby ,(select '/'+JingQuCode +'/' from Resuser WHERE USERNAME= '|CREATEBY|' ) as JQRP_CODE ,(select '/'+JingQuCode+'/' from Resuser WHERE USERNAME= '|CREATEBY|' ) as JQCOD_PATH
CallMethodMod.Name: 首页

CallMethodMod.Sql:
select *, isnull(priceinfo,'还没有定义景区门票!
请与管理员联系.') as priceinfo1, jingqucode as JQCODE ,jingqucode as JINGQUCODE ,jingquname as 景区名字 , '/'+matchdomain +'/' as JQRP_CODE , '/'+matchdomain +'/' as JQCOD_PATH from JingQus
CallMethodMod.Name: 景区首页

CallMethodMod.Sql: select s.* , '/'+ b.MatchDomain+'/' as JQRP_CODE ,'/'+b.MatchDomain+'/' AS JQCOD_PATH from Sites s, JingQus b where s.JingQuCode = b.JingQuCode
CallMethodMod.Name: 景点信息

CallMethodMod.Sql: select a.*, '/'+b.MatchDomain+'/' AS JQCOD_PATH, b.Jingquname from Questions a, JingQus b where a.JingQuCode= b.JingQuCode
CallMethodMod.Name: 问题信息

CallMethodMod.Sql: SELECT a.* , '/'+ a.JingQuCode+'/' as JQRP_CODE , '/'+ b.MatchDomain+'/' AS JQCOD_PATH FROM HireCar a, JingQus b where a.JingQuCode= b.JingQuCode
CallMethodMod.Name: 租车信息

CallMethodMod.Sql: select b.* ,convert(char(10),b.CREATE_DATE,20) as create_date1, '/'+ b.JingQuCode+'/' as JQRP_CODE , '/'+b1.MatchDomain+'/' AS JQCOD_PATH ,( select title from NewsType as a where a.guid=b.tguid ) as TYPENAME,(select code from NewsType as a where a.guid=b.tguid ) as TYPECODE from news as b, JingQus b1 where b.JingQuCode=b1.JingQuCode
CallMethodMod.Name: 新闻具体页

CallMethodMod.Sql:
select a.* , '/'+ b.MatchDomain+'/' as JQRP_CODE , '/'+b.MatchDomain+'/' AS JQCOD_PATH , ( select top 1 AreaName from JingQu_Area ja where ja.JingQuAreaId=a.area and ja.JinqQuCode=a.JingQuCode) as areaname ,
(select top 1 tag_name from Base_Dict_Tag where enum_type_name='HotelType' and enum_value=a.hoteltype) as TYPENAME from Hotel as a , JingQus b where a.JingQuCode=b.JingQuCode
CallMethodMod.Name: 酒店信息

CallMethodMod.Sql: select '/'+ jq.MatchDomain+'/' as JQRP_CODE , '/'+jq.MatchDomain+'/' AS JQCOD_PATH ,a.*,b.title as typename ,b.tag as type from products as a left join ProductsType as b on b.guid=a.ptype , JingQus jq where a.JingQuCode = jq.JingQuCode
CallMethodMod.Name: 产品信息

CallMethodMod.Sql: select * , '/'+ JingQuCode+'/' as JQRP_CODE , '/'+JingQuCode+'/' AS JQCOD_PATH from Bus_Issue_Info
CallMethodMod.Name: 文章页
